scripts.dev: concurrently --restart-tries 3 --restart-after 2000 "npm run dev --workspace=idz-shared" "npm run dev --workspace=idz-background" "npm run watch --workspace=idz-popup" "npm run dev --workspace=idz-extension"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=idz-shared && npm run build --workspace=idz-background && npm run build --workspace=idz-popup && npm run build --workspace=idz-extension && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r packages/idz-extension/dist/* dist
scripts.build-zip: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist.zip ./*
